Description: Gradienty.codes is a powerful, Tailwind‑compatible design toolkit offering over 20,000 curated gradients along with tools for creating vibrant backgrounds, text & box‑shadow gradients, glassmorphic effects, animated icons, palette visualizer, blob/mesh generators, and more—streamlined for easy live preview and Tailwind CSS code export.

Colorize.design is a free tool that extracts color palettes from any website—by analyzing the page screenshot, favicon, and underlying HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. Users can edit, share, and download palettes in multiple formats, and developers can integrate via API.

tools.ui‑layouts.com is an open‑source creative toolbox built for designers and developers. It offers generators for shadows, SVG shapes, clip‑path effects, mesh gradients, background patterns, and a color lab—fast, lightweight, and ready for building modern UI assets. The source code is publicly available on GitHub.

shadcnstudio.com (also known as Shadcn Studio) is an open‑source registry of copy‑and‑paste shadcn components, blocks, and templates—paired with a powerful live theme generator. It empowers developers to customize UI components in real time (including colors, typography, Light/Dark modes, animated variants), then copy the code directly into their project for fast, flexible integration. Built for efficiency and adaptability with Tailwind v4 compatibility.

All Shadcn is a comprehensive, curated platform offering a vast library of Shadcn UI components, blocks, templates, and tools—both free and premium—for React and Tailwind CSS developers. It streamlines UI development with ready-made, accessible, and customizable assets, organized across categories like theme generators, modals, dashboards, and more.

Animate UI is an open-source, beta-phase distribution of motion-animated React components built with Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Motion, and the Shadcn CLI. It allows developers to install or copy‑paste beautifully animated primitives, text effects, dynamic backgrounds, and more—designed to seamlessly complement Shadcn UI components. Fully MIT licensed and easy to integrate into modern UIs.

shadcn-minimal-tiptap is a lightweight, customizable rich text editor component built for Shadcn UI, leveraging Tiptap and Tailwind CSS. It offers features like image uploads, toolbar customization, and multiple output formats (HTML, JSON, Text). With support for extensions like CodeBlockLowlight, Color, Heading, Image, Link, Placeholder, TextStyle, and Typography, it's designed for seamless integration into React applications. The project is open-source under the MIT license.
